Name: Snake Robot
About the game: Times are changing. Meet the new hungry Snake Robot that destroys everything in its path. In this casual game, your main mission is to survive as long as possible by killing the enemies that want to stop you from growing. The idea is that you will become bigger and bigger, becoming an obstacle even for yourself. Do you think you really know your own powers? Wait and see what will happen when you grow up. Game Features : - Permanent growth - Enemy robots - Fearless snake - Score/length
